Title: 🖼 🇨🇳 China announced changes in the policies of the real estat...
Description: 🇨🇳 China announced changes in the policies of the real estate market.Big cities in China (Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou) decided to loosen up the limitations on purchasing houses.Specifically, Guangzhou announced that it lifted up all limitations (until now, non-permanent residents of the city had to pay taxes or have social insurance of up to 6 months to purchase a house) while in Shanghai the time limit had been reduced from three to one year.After the announcements, the stocks of the construction companies rose. The measure -Hang Seng Mainland Properties- rose about 6.41% in a day while some of the stocks had double digits % of rising.Central Bank of China played a role as well by cutting the (central) interest rate of house loans with 0.5% and reduced the payment in advance of a second house on 15% of the price.📝 Financial Greeks (Chris Tsounis)🗺️ @PoliticsGR
